amendment.description: To strike section 31, relating to garage door opener standards.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4124 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4124 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S1576, S1581-1585; text: CR S1576) To strike section 31, relating to garage door opener standards.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4124 proposed by Senator DeMint.
